NAL TELEVISION
Room 112, Knott Building — Telephone: 3-5089
TALLAHASSEE. FLORIDA
October 6, 1959
COMMISSION
JAMES ETHERIDGE, J:
Executive Secretary
Dr. Harry Skornia, Executive Director
National Association of Educational Bros
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
I am sure you will be interested in the enclosed resolution unanimously
adopted by our Commission.
We hope that the NAEB will find it possible to make mention of this
resolution in its publications.
I hope to see you in Detroit — at least in the early days of the convention,
Best personal regards always.
Sincerely,
